QuestData.Title: Best Plans and Intentions
QuestData.Description:
Attacking the djaradin controlling the Obsidian Citadel will be no easy task. Even with Wrathion and his Blacktalon forces, this will be a fierce battle. Wrathion may be confident, but... I am not so certain.
Perhaps we can speak to those helping to plan the strategy, and see if we can find any room for improvement.
QuestData.LogDescription: Review the plans with the various members of Wrathion's forces.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Report your findings to Wrathion at the Obsidian Bulwark.
QuestData.RewardText: I see. I shall consider your evaluation carefully, of course.
